event.descr:
A linkDown trap signifies that the sending protocol entity recognizes a failure in one of the communication link represented in the agent's configuration.

Instance: %parm[#1]%

IfDescr: %parm[ifDescr]%

IfName: %parm[ifName]%

IfAlias: %parm[ifAlias]%
event.logmsg: Agent Interface Down (linkDown Trap) on interface index:%parm[#1]%; ifDescr: %parm[ifDescr]%; ifName:%parm[ifName]%; ifAlias:%parm[ifAlias]%

event.descr:
A linkUp trap signifies that the sending protocol entity recognizes that one of the communication links represented in the agent's configuration has come up.

Instance: %parm[#1]%

IfDescr: %parm[ifDescr]%

IfName: %parm[ifName]%

IfAlias: %parm[ifAlias]%
event.logmsg: Agent Interface Up (linkUp Trap) on interface index:%parm[#1]%; ifDescr:%parm[ifDescr]%; ifName:%parm[ifName]%; IfAlias:%parm[ifAlias]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: An event received from Hyperic has been translated
event.descr:
This is a translated Hyperic Alert to associate with OpenNMS entity..

Alert reason: %parm[action.shortReason]%

Alert reason: %parm[action.longReason]%

%parm[resource.name]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a configuration change on a device and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
This is a translated entity configuration change event.

Source: %parm[configSource]%

User: %parm[configUser]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
This notification signifies that the system clock frequency goes to holdover state.

jnxTcaTrapAttrSource %parm[#1]%;

jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity %parm[#2]%;

ipAddress %parm[ipAddress]%;
event.logmsg: jnxTcaTrapMsgFrequencyHoldover trap received jnxTcaTrapAttrSource=%parm[#1]% jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
This notification signifies that the system clock frequency that went to holdover state was cleared.

jnxTcaTrapAttrSource %parm[#1]%;

jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity %parm[#2]%;

ipAddress %parm[ipAddress]%;
event.logmsg: jnxTcaTrapMsgFrequencyHoldover trap received jnxTcaTrapAttrSource=%parm[#1]% jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
This notification signifies that the system clock frequency goes to freerun state.

jnxTcaTrapAttrSource %parm[#1]%;

jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity %parm[#2]%;

ipAddress %parm[ipAddress]%;
event.logmsg: jnxTcaTrapMsgFrequencyFreerun trap received jnxTcaTrapAttrSource=%parm[#1]% jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
This notification signifies that the system clock frequency that went to freerun state was cleared.

jnxTcaTrapAttrSource %parm[#1]%;

jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity %parm[#2]%;

ipAddress %parm[ipAddress]%;
event.logmsg: jnxTcaTrapMsgFrequencyFreerun trap received jnxTcaTrapAttrSource=%parm[#1]% jnxTcaTrapAttrSeverity=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
A trap which signifies that DPLL state change (unknown, lock_acq, locked, holder, freerun). jnxClksyncDpllState indicates the Dpll status jnxClksyncDpllStateStr indicates the Dpll status in string format.

jnxClksyncDpllState: %parm[#1]%

jnxClksyncDpllStateStr: %parm[#2]%

IpAddress: %parm[ipAddress]%
event.logmsg: jnxTimingEventDpllStatus trap received jnxClksyncDpllState=%parm[#1]% jnxClksyncDpllStateStr=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
A trap which signifies that DPLL state change (unknown, lock_acq, locked, holder, freerun). jnxClksyncDpllState indicates the Dpll status jnxClksyncDpllStateStr indicates the Dpll status in string format.

jnxClksyncDpllState: %parm[#1]%

jnxClksyncDpllStateStr: %parm[#2]%

IpAddress: %parm[ipAddress]%
event.logmsg: jnxTimingEventDpllStatus trap received jnxClksyncDpllState=%parm[#1]% jnxClksyncDpllStateStr=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
A trap which signifies that PTP servo state (Init, Acquiring, PhaseAligned, FreeRun, Holdover). jnxPtpServoState indicates the ptp servo status jnxPtpServoStateStr indicates the ptp servo status in string format.

jnxPtpServoState: %parm[#1]%

jnxPtpServoStateStr: %parm[#2]%

IpAddress: %parm[ipAddress]%
event.logmsg: jnxTimingEventPtpServoStatus trap received jnxPtpServoState=%parm[#1]% jnxPtpServoStateStr=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS defined event: A trap based event was received indicating a frequency change in clock and has been translated to this generic event
event.descr:
A trap which signifies that PTP servo state (Init, Acquiring, PhaseAligned, FreeRun, Holdover). jnxPtpServoState indicates the ptp servo status jnxPtpServoStateStr indicates the ptp servo status in string format.

jnxPtpServoState: %parm[#1]%

jnxPtpServoStateStr: %parm[#2]%

IpAddress: %parm[ipAddress]%
event.logmsg: jnxTimingEventPtpServoStatus trap received jnxPtpServoState=%parm[#1]% jnxPtpServoStateStr=%parm[#2]% ipAddress=%parm[ipAddress]%
